title: Problem with "A Real Challenger" Mission
body: Anyone have any ideas as to why I'm stuck on 3/4 with no other missions left to complete? Wonder if it may have to do with the fact I purchased the missions from the store prior to completing the first mission so maybe that bugged it somehow. Anyone have thoughts or suggestions?

replies.body:
Hey there. 

You will get new missions next week: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot

Regards,
Milah
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Looks like two of those missions might have been completed at the exact same time and causing this weird delay. Give that mission a bit of time and it should be recorded soon!

Hello Mr. Broporo, 

It is still 3/4 with no missions reamaining. Should I be worried? :(
No worries yet! We'll be getting the next set of missions on Oct 2
I think this will also happen to me once I complete the two missions I have currently
